chapters.title: Chapter 16: The Subject of Negotiations
chapters.info: Lelaine Akashi, p. 404 (485)—Slender Sitter for the Blue Ajah in Salidar. She carries a dignified air about her. She was a Sitter in the White Tower for forty years until Siuan was deposed. She is quite old. She now leads one of two factions that divides the Hall of the Tower under Egwene. See also Cassin, Romanda.
